placeholder.description: Use the placeholder prop to set a placeholder text.
placeholder.description_zh: Use the placeholder prop to set a placeholder text.

:v-model.description: Use a v-model to make the Textarea reactive.
:v-model.description_zh: Use a v-model to make the Textarea reactive.

:rows.description: Use the rows prop to set the number of rows of the Textarea.
:rows.description_zh: Use the rows prop to set the number of rows of the Textarea.

disabled.description: Use the disabled prop to disable the Textarea.
disabled.description_zh: Use the disabled prop to disable the Textarea.

padded.description: Use the padded prop to remove the padding of the Textarea.
padded.description_zh: Use the padded prop to remove the padding of the Textarea.

autoresize.description: Use the autoresize prop to enable the autoresize. Writing more lines than the rows prop will make the Textarea grow up.
autoresize.description_zh: Use the autoresize prop to enable the autoresize. Writing more lines than the rows prop will make the Textarea grow up.

resize.description: Use the resize prop to enable the resize control.
resize.description_zh: Use the resize prop to enable the resize control.
